title: Issue Generation Curtailment Order
description: Due to low demand and high solar generation, a system operator needs to curtail a large solar farm to prevent over-generation.

tasks.description: The system forecasts an over-generation condition in the next hour.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates an alert for impending over-supply.

tasks.description: Identify the most economical resource to curtail based on market bids and contracts.
tasks.expected_outcome: System determines a specific solar farm is the least-cost resource to curtail.

tasks.description: Send a dispatch signal to the solar farm, instructing it to reduce its output to a specific MW setpoint.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully sends the curtailment order.
